TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed NSStreamServiceType extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Possible values for the service type for an NSStream.

remarks.para: The service type of an NSStream determine which kind of service a stream is providing. The Background and Video and VoIP affect the audio routing and can control whether an application is suspended or not.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Foundation.NSStreamServiceType Background = int32(3)

Docs.summary: This stream is providing a background service

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Foundation.NSStreamServiceType Default = int32(0)

Docs.summary: Default: the stream does not support a background, video or voice operation.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Foundation.NSStreamServiceType Video = int32(2)

Docs.summary: This stream is used to provide video..

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Foundation.NSStreamServiceType Voice = int32(4)

Docs.summary: This stream is used to provide voice audio.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Foundation.NSStreamServiceType VoIP = int32(1)

Docs.summary: This stream is used to provide VoIP traffic.
